name: pdf2mx
description: A package to take a json structure and convert it to a mendix form, using the model sdk

scripts.upload: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name pdf2mx --zip-file fileb://./updateModel.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.upload-pdf: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name pdf2mx --zip-file fileb://./pdf2mx.zip --region us-east-1

author: Conner Charlebois & Luke Karlovich
